Description_lang: $?s152276[While Shield Block is active, your shield block value is increased by $169688s1%. Shield Charge increases the damage of Heroic Strike, Slam, and Revenge by an additional $s2%][While Shield Block is active, your shield block value is increased by $169688s1%].

description_blz.en_US: While Shield Block is active, your shield block value is increased by 5%.
description_blz.es_MX: Mientras Bloquear con escudo está activo, el valor de tu bloqueo con escudo aumenta un 5%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Enquanto Levantar Escudo estiver ativo, o valor de bloqueio do seu escudo aumenta em 5%.
description_blz.de_DE: Während 'Schildblock' aktiv ist, ist Euer Blockwert um 5% erhöht.
description_blz.en_GB: While Shield Block is active, your shield block value is increased by 5%.
description_blz.es_ES: Mientras Bloquear con escudo está activo, tu valor de bloqueo con escudo aumenta un 5%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Tant que Maîtrise du blocage est active, votre valeur de blocage est augmentée de 5%.
description_blz.it_IT: Quando Scudo Saldo è attivo, la probabilità di blocco aumenta del 5%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Во время действия "Блока щитом" вероятность блокирования щита повышается на 5%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 방패 올리기가 활성화된 동안 방패 막기가 5%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 盾牌格擋的持續期間內，你的盾牌格擋值提高5%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 当盾牌格挡激活时，你的盾牌格挡值提高5%。
